item.content:encoded:
I Love You Tomato Valentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card

Review I Love You Tomato Valentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card – Valentines Day Cards I Love You Tomato Valentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card Have a promotion during this period I Love You Tomato Valentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card order now with fast delivery service to your hand as soon as possibleThis funny and cute Valentine’s Day card is a light and sweet way to show someone love on this special holiday. It features the phrase, "I love your from my head to-ma-toes," with hand-drawn hearts and tomato cartoon on top of a simple white background. You can customize the message on the inside to say whatever you’d like. The color scheme includes bright red, medium pink, black, green, and white. It’s fun, modern, romantic, trendy, and cool.

***IMPORTANT DESIGN NOTE: For any custom design request such as matching product requests, color changes, placement changes, or any other change request, please click on the "MESSAGE" button or email the designer directly at [email protected]. You can even email her a request for a completely custom and new design. Price:$2.61

Review I Love You Tomato Valentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card ($2.61)
